title: Why Companhia Siderurgica (SID) is Such a Great Value Stock Pick Right Now - Nasdaq.com
text: Value investing is always a very popular strategy, and for good reason. After all, who doesn't want to find stocks that have low PEs, solid outlooks, and decen t dividends  ?  makeArticleAd();  Fortunately for investors looking for this combination, we have identified a strong candidate which may be an impressive value; Companhia Siderúrgica Nacional SID  .   Companhia Siderurgica in Focus    SID may be an interesting play thanks to its forward PE of 5.1, its P/S ratio of 0.7, and its decen t dividend yield  of 4.6%. These factors suggest that Companhia Siderurgica is a pretty good value pick, as investors have to pay a relatively low level for each dollar o f earnings  , and that SID has decent revenue metrics to back up its earnings.   Companhia Siderurgica PS Ratio (TTM)         Companhia Siderurgica  ps-ratio-ttm    |   Companhia Siderurgica Quote   But before you think that Companhia Siderurgica is just a pure value play, it is important to note that it has been seeing solid activity on the earnings estimate front as well.
